casebody.data:
ESTATE OF Frank P. LAGANO, Plaintiff,
v.
BERGEN COUNTY PROSECUTOR'S OFFICE, Defendant,
and
Michael Mordaga, Defendant. State of New Jersey, Plaintiff-Movant,
v.
$1,297,522.20, Defendant,
and
Estate of Frank P. Lagano, Claimant-Respondent. M-1245/1246/1247 September Term 2017
081038 Supreme Court of New Jersey. June 15, 2018

ORDER

It is ORDERED that the motion for an extension of time within which to file a motion for leave to appeal (M-1245) is granted; and it is further

ORDERED that the motion for a stay (M-1246) is dismissed as moot; and it is further

ORDERED that the motion for leave to appeal (M-1247) is denied.
